alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:49PM MST until December 14 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Wind River Basin, Lander Foothills, and eastern slopes of the Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions, including over South Pass. Blowing and drifting snow is possible, which would severely reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
